title.rendered: How do I create a listing on Roomi?

content.rendered:
You can make use of your two free credits to create two free listings on your Roomi account to post your available room or rooms for rent on Roomi. You must be in Lister Mode to post a listing.  Please reference our Help Center article, ‘How do I switch between Mover and Lister Mode?’ to switch between modes. Your exact address is not visible to other users. For a full set of listing requirements, please review our article, “What are the requirements to get my listing approved and verified?”Web

  • Login to your Roomi account from our homepage and click ‘List Your Room For Free’ from the top menu
  • You will then be asked to enter your address, rent amount, move-in date, room information, listing description, roommate preferences, and your information.
  • Click ‘Submit’

iOS

  • Tap ‘More’ in the bottom right-hand corner of the menu and the slide out menu will appear on the right
  • Tap ‘Create a Listing’
  • You will then be asked to set your roommate preferences, listing location, any amenities your space offers, photos, and a description of your place

Android

  • Tap the ‘menu icon’ (the icon represents three small lines stacked vertically) in the top-left hand corner
  • Tap on ‘Create a Listing’
  • You will then be asked to set your roommate preferences, listing location, any amenities your space offers, photos, and a description of your place. You can navigate through these settings by swiping through them at the top of the screen or taping the ‘Next’ arrow in the bottom right-hand corner.
  • Tap the ‘Roomi’ icon to upload your listing in the bottom right-hand corner

jetpack-related-posts.title: How can I trust that listings are real?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We do our best to make sure that only real people with an actual room for rent can list a room on Roomi. Most listers on Roomi verify their account by providing a copy of their lease, utility bill or government issued ID. You will see certain badges on a…

jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you need to adjust your rent price, amenities, roommate preferences, or any other changes, please follow the steps below to edit your listing: Web Login to your Roomi account and click My ListingsYour listing may appear under the Active, Inactive, or Incomplete tab depending on its status. jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I deactivate my listing?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Deactivating your listing will take it out of the search results while giving you the option to re-activate it at a later time. As soon as the listing is deactivated you will need a listing credit in order to reactivate it. When you reactivate your listing you will need to…

jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Whenever you ask someone where you can find rooms for rent, it's hard for them to provide a clear answer. Some lucked out on Facebook, other found referrals through friends, and others may have braved the world of Craigslist. However, since these platforms aren’t room finding portals specifically, they don't…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Can I list multiple rooms?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Roomi only allows multiple rooms if they are at the same address. If you have multiple bedrooms in your house or apartment for rent, please create a separate listing for each bedroom, you will require a listing credit for each room you are posting, you can only create or activate…
